title: Your Gateway to earn (mucho) Profits

v2.HeroText: (mucho) Vaults V2 will automatically invest your deposits in different protocols, allowing you to earn interests. Integration with other protocols is programmatic and decentralized, so nobody will own your tokens but you.
v2.aprNote: The total APR displayed is the sum of the vault APR itself + Bonus APR from your subscription plan.
v2.noNftNote: You do not have a subscription plan! Get one and boost your APR up to +10%.
v2.NftHero: Become a protocol "partner" and earn profit from total TVL by owning one of our NFT Susbcription Plans. Profits are rewarded on weekly basis.
v2.Annual Expected Yield for NFT Holders: Annual Expected Yield for NFT Holders
v2.Your expected annual NFT Bonus Yield: Your expected annual NFT Bonus Yield
v2.CompoundNote: *You will be asked to sign 3 transactions, to harvest your rewards and deposit them on WETH vault

badge.HeroText: Subscribe to your plan, and you will receive a NFT token that will identify you with benefits in our protocols!
